meanings.definition: A hypothetical object that absorbs all incident electromagnetic radiation
meanings.sent1: In science fiction, a blackbody is an object that can absorb all types of light.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of a blackbody to understand how it interacts with radiation.
meanings.sent3: The alien spaceship was coated with a material that acted like a blackbody, making it invisible to radar.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a blackbody, absorbing all the love and warmth around her.
meanings.sent5: The blackbody in the experiment absorbed every color of light, leaving nothing to reflect.

meanings.definition: An object that emits thermal radiation with a spectrum determined only by its temperature
meanings.sent1: The blackbody in the lab emitted heat evenly across its surface.
meanings.sent2: A blackbody at a high temperature will emit more radiation than one at a lower temperature.
meanings.sent3: The blackbody at the barbecue grill seemed to be working overtime, radiating heat in all directions.
meanings.sent4: The sun can be thought of as a massive blackbody, emitting energy constantly.
meanings.sent5: The blackbody in the furnace glowed red hot, indicating its high temperature.
